headline: Assessing Textron (TXT) Valuation As FAA Engine Certification Supports Beechcraft Denali Program Progress
summary: Why Textron is on investors’ radar today Textron (TXT) is back in focus after recent trading, with the stock last closing at $98.65. The move has investors comparing that price with its recent performance and current fundamentals. See our latest analysis for Textron. The latest share price of $98.65 comes after a 30 day share price return of 12.03% and a 90 day share price return of 20.30%. The 1 year total shareholder return of 32.14% and 5 year total shareholder return of 91.07% indicate...
